title: Eastside HOT SPOT - Great Location - Walk Walk Walk
posting_body: Great little community in walkable Eastside area.
Finish your work day, walk from your spot over to a great brewery on the Eastside.
Walk to top restaurants and coffee shops to work from.
😊 Community offers sky lounge with downtown views, quaint pool and fitness center, pet friendly community with dog run, bike storage, walking distance to metro, gated garage parking and much more!
🔑 Apartments are contemporary light wooded flooring, white subway tile backsplashes, patios and balconies on units, washer and dryer
Text for more info or a tour and we'll get you set!
My service is 100% FREE for you!
*Pricing and lease terms subject to change by the property.
Pictures are taken from the property but may not be exact unit.
I can get you all the detailed info over to you.*
